DOC.brief_summary: A randomised , comparative , prospective , single-blinded trial two hip prosthesis : 1 . Marathon cement all-poly acetabular cup ( Depuy , Warsaw , Indiana ) , Corail uncemented femoral stem ( Depuy , Warsaw , Indiana ) , 32mm Alumina Biolox Forte femoral head ( Depuy , Warsaw , Indiana ) 2 . Pinnacle/Marathon uncemented cup ( Depuy , Warsaw , Indiana ) , Corail uncemented femoral stem ( Depuy , Warsaw , Indiana ) , 32mm Alumina Biolox Forte femoral head ( Depuy , Warsaw , Indiana ) There in-group randomisation Corail femoral stem without collar , create number 4 study-groups total . The aim study : - To compare polyethylene wear migration moderately cross-linked Marathon polyethylene cement version ( Marathon ) uncemented cup ( Pinnacle/Marathon ) - To evaluate micromigration periacetabular bone mineral density 2 cup use radiostereometry ( RSA ) - To evaluate migration pattern proximal femoral bone density change around Corail stem without collar
DOC.criteria: Age 70 year primary secondary arthritis hip , aseptic necrosis femoral head , acute hip fracture sequela hip fracture . Active malignant disease , rheumatoid arthritis generalise autoimmune arthritic disease , BMI > 35 , insulin dependent diabetes mellitus , 0 chronic recurrent infection , liver disease , Paget 's disease , dementia lack compliance reason , uncompensated cardiac pulmonary disease ( ASA class 3 4 ) . Prosthesis contralateral hip exclude patient , one hip patient include study .
